heading: Good ending with important message
review: This movie gives the important message that nothing is achieved by violence. India and Pakistan will only be able to be friends by, well, being friendly to each other.  In the name of religion, terrorists invade India and spread bloodshed in Kashmir, both POK and Indian, killing innocent civilians, leaving no room for love.  The ending is very poetic and conveys this message beautifully.  However, although this message is conveyed, there still is that disgusting Gadar-style Pakistan bashing in the first half. If the theme of the movie is to spread love, then why do is it rip on Pakistan? I have a feeling those dialogues were added in to commercialize" the film. The ending makes up for it
